Package simple

Class simple

  • java.lang.Object
    • simple.simple
  • public class simple
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements a simple 3D rendering application using the 3D rendering API provided by the package jrtr. Opens a 3D rendering window and shows a rotating cube.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  simple.SimpleRenderPanel
      An extension of GLRenderPanel or SWRenderPanel to provide a call-back function for initialization.

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
        The main function opens a window 3D rendering window, implemented by the class simple.SimpleRenderPanel. simple.SimpleRenderPanel.init(jrtr.RenderContext) is then called back for initialization. simple.SimpleRenderPanel.init(jrtr.RenderContext) constructs a simple 3D scene.
